On September 16, 2023, a baby llama was run over and killed by one of the drive-thru safari buses in the facility’s drive-
thru park area. Insufficient distance and/or barriers between the animals and the public may lead to harm, stress, or threat
to safety to the animals and to the public. The licensee must ensure any animals are handled so there is minimal risk of

This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives.

narrative:
2.131(c)(1)  Critical Repeat
   
Handling of animals. 
On September 16, 2023, a baby llama was run over and killed by one of the drive-thru safari buses in the facility’s drive-
thru park area. Insufficient distance and/or barriers between the animals and the public may lead to harm, stress, or threat 
to safety to the animals and to the public. The licensee must ensure any animals are handled so there is minimal risk of 
harm to the animals and to the public during public exhibition. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives.
